text: Krystal is an American fast food restaurant chain with its headquarters in Dunwoody, Georgia. It is known for its small, square hamburger sliders. It was founded in 1932. == Other websites == * Krystal website Category:American fast food restaurants Category:Companies based in Georgia (U.S. state) Category:1932 establishments in the United States Category:20th-century establishments in Georgia (U.S. state)
title: Krystal (restaurant)
